metadata.name: Golden Gabber
metadata.description:
If you think early hardcore rules, you're sure to get along with Golden Gabber.

A nod to the past and at the same time, to the future, as the gabber returns stronger than ever.

Golden Gabber is a piece with an exclusive aesthetic, in which the golden color is the protagonist in contrast with the black.

Resolution 1080x1350.

Endless looping animation.
